snippet: LIEBER--Constance. The Board of Governors and members of Beach Point Club note with deep sorrow the passing of our fellow member, Constance Lieber, and extend sincere condolences to her family. James Dreyfus, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: LIEBER--Constance. The Board of Governors and members of Beach Point Club note with deep sorrow the passing of our fellow member, Constance Lieber, and extend sincere condolences to her family. James Dreyfus, President 1/3
